zen.text: "The best leaders of all, the people know not they exist. They turn to each other and say We did it ourselves."
"One day a student asked Taiga, "What is the most difficult part of painting?" Taiga answered, "The part of the paper where nothing is painted is the most difficult.""
"Let go over a cliff, die completely, and then come back to life â€” after that you cannot be deceived."
"Knowledge is learning something every day. Wisdom is letting go of something every day."
